I spill my Coke all the time when I'm talking.
i am a weightlifter.
I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
I'm keeping it professional at work and focused on my studies.

participant_2.background:
I remember my father coming home at night after a long shift and telling me stories about his day.
i love to go to the lake.
On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun.
I comfort myself with my dolls.
my parents were scientists.

content.text: What are you up to today?
I am just relaxing, watching some TV. What about you?
I am working on some personal development, trying to learn more about myself and how to live a more fulfilling life.
That's really cool, I'm always trying to do the same. I love going to the lake to relax. It's so peaceful and serene.
I love going to the lake too! I used to go with my dad all the time when I was a kid.
Me too! My dad would tell me stories about his day and I would just listen intently. He was always so great at making me feel like everything was going to be okay.
Your dad sounds like a great man.
He was the best. I still miss him every day.
I'm sure he's watching over you, smiling down on you.
I like to think so too.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love going to the beach on the weekends. It's so much fun to relax and have fun with friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I could go to the beach more often.
You should! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I'll try to go more often.
Good! You'll have a lot of fun
